comments.author: Jef Simpson
comments.content:
I have lost your email address. can you email me back and this time I will save it. Did you get the email that I sent you. I attached a Photo.

was it to big of a file? the following is my web site. it has a few more photos on it of us wheelin

in the mountains around Seattle.

Jef Simpson

http://home.comcast.net/~jef.simpson/wsb/html/view.cgi-home.html-.html

comments.author: Vinay Khatri
comments.content: You all are adventur persons. I must appreciate your efforts for making the trips and documenting it on internet.
